name: ultimate-wavesurfer-mpv-sync
description: 🎯 Ultimate WaveSurfer-MPV Audio Sync - Professional audio visualization with perfect synchronization

scripts.ultimate: echo '🎯 Starting Ultimate WaveSurfer-MPV Experience...' && npm run dev
scripts.reset: npm run clean && echo '🎯 Ultimate project reset complete!'
scripts.check: echo '🔍 Checking Ultimate System...' && node --version && npm --version && echo '✅ Node.js and npm are ready!'
scripts.mpv-test: mpv --version || echo '⚠️ MPV not found. Please install MPV media player.'
scripts.system-check: npm run check && npm run mpv-test
scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npx serve -s build
scripts.performance: echo '📊 Performance mode - optimized for speed' && NODE_ENV=production npm run dev

author: Ultimate Developer
